The 51-year-old Mike Pence is a darling of social conservatives and often describes himself as a Christian, a conservative, and a Republican, in that order. The congressman's future has been the subject of speculation since he resigned the No. 3 GOP House leadership slot after winning sixth term in November. THIS IS A BREAKING NEWS UPDATE.
